pages.text: Now this one is not to be trifled with, nor is it useful on its own. This extraction rune can absorb the essence and soul of a being and store them inside the tears. I have theorized that this can be used for some kind of teleportation, though it will not work with this rune alone.
Thankfully it does not work without a proper endpoint, such as the $(l:runes/destination)Destination Rune.$(/l)
